description:
At The Law Firm of Nonna Shikh, PC, we practice only personal injury law. Headquartered in Elmhurst, New York, we have been obtaining compensation for accident victims in all five New York boroughs since 1997. Our three convenient New York City offices, in Manhattan, Queens and the Bronx, make us easily accessible.

As a full-service personal injury law firm, we stand ready, willing and able to provide you with superior legal advice, counsel and representation in the following areas:

  • Automobile accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Slip, trip and fall accidents
  • Construction accidents
  • Nursing home negligence and abuse
  • Police abuse

In addition, we compassionately represent families who have lost a loved one to wrongful death because of someone's negligence or wrongdoing.

The Law Firm of Nonna Shikh, PC, provides you with a free initial consultation during which we will take the time to get to know you, listen to your story, answer your questions and advise you of your options, including whether you should accept the insurance company's current offer.

Rest assured, you will pay no upfront legal fees or out-of-pocket expenses associated with your case. You will pay nothing unless and until we obtain the maximum possible amount of compensation for you.
